UDP_PLOT_COMMAND:
plot1 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string1 = %f;
name1 = Yaw
linewidth1 = 2
plot2 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string2 = %*f; %f;
name2 = Pitch
linewidth2 = 2
plot3 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string3 = %*f; %*f; %f;
name3 = Roll
linewidth3 = 2
plot4 = 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
string4 = %*f; %*f; %*f; %f;
name4 = Heave
linewidth4 = 2
UDP_MOD_COMMAND:
# udp input

yaw_kp = 0.2
yaw_ki = 0.0
yaw_kd = -0.2

pitch_kp = 0.4
pitch_ki = 0.0
pitch_kd = -0.4

roll_kp = 0.4
roll_ki = 0.0
roll_kd = -0.3

heave_kp = 1
heave_ki = 0
heave_kd = 0

yaw_recover_enable = 1
yaw_max_difference_enable = 1
yaw_recover_target = 0
yaw_recover_proportion = 0.02
yaw_max_difference = 0.5
yaw_max_difference_proportion = 0.2
yaw_range = 6.283
yaw_x2_proportion = 0.1
yaw_x2_limit = 1

pitch_recover_enable = 1
pitch_max_difference_enable = 1
pitch_recover_target = 0
pitch_recover_proportion = 0.02
pitch_max_difference = 3.1415
pitch_max_difference_proportion = 0.2
pitch_range = 6.283


roll_recover_enable = 1
roll_max_difference_enable = 1
roll_recover_target = 0
roll_recover_proportion = 0.02
roll_max_difference = 3.1415
roll_max_difference_proportion = 0.2
roll_range = 6.283



heave_recover_enable = 1
heave_max_difference_enable = 0
heave_recover_target = 0
heave_recover_proportion = 0.01
heave_max_difference = 100000
heave_max_difference_proportion = 0.2
heave_range = 1000000


spline_enable = 0

yaw_c1 = 0
yaw_c2 = 400
yaw_c3 = 255

pitch_c1 = 0
pitch_c2 = 1500
pitch_c3 = 255

roll_c1 = 0
roll_c2 = -1500
roll_c3 = 255

heave_c1 = 0
heave_c2 = 0
heave_c3 = 0

spline_plot_sampling_rate = 10
spline_interpolation_rate = 10
MWAVE_MOD_COMMAND:
# motion wave

yaw_proportion = 1
pitch_proportion = 1
roll_proportion = 1
heave_proportion = 1

spline_enable = 0

yaw_c1 = 0
yaw_c2 = 1
yaw_c3 = 0

pitch_c1 = 0
pitch_c2 = 1
pitch_c3 = 0

roll_c1 = 0
roll_c2 = 1
roll_c3 = 0

heave_c1 = 0
heave_c2 = 1
heave_c3 = 0

#spline_plot_sampling_rate = 10
#spline_interpolation_rate = 10

motionview_spline_sampling_rate = 2
motionview_spline_interpolation_rate = 2
motionview_time_scaling = 1
motionview_start_delay = 20
JOYSTICK_MOD_COMMAND:
# joystick

yaw_proportion = 1
pitch_proportion = 1
roll_proportion = 1
heave_proportion = 1

spline_enable = 1

yaw_c1 = 0
yaw_c2 = 1
yaw_c3 = 0

pitch_c1 = 0
pitch_c2 = 1
pitch_c3 = 0

roll_c1 = 0
roll_c2 = 1
roll_c3 = 0

heave_c1 = 0
heave_c2 = 1
heave_c3 = 0

spline_plot_sampling_rate = 10
spline_interpolation_rate = 10



yaw_recover_enable = 0
yaw_max_difference_enable = 0

pitch_recover_enable = 0
pitch_max_difference_enable = 0
roll_recover_enable = 0
roll_max_difference_enable = 0
heave_recover_enable = 0
heave_max_difference_enable = 0
MIXING_COMMAND:
#input = udp
#input = motionwave
input = joystick+udp+motionwave

mixing_input1_enable = 0
mixing_rate1_all = 0
mixing_rate1_yaw = 0
mixing_rate1_pitch = 0
mixing_rate1_roll = 0
mixing_rate1_heave = 0

mixing_input2_enable = 1
mixing_rate2_all = 1
mixing_rate2_yaw = 0
mixing_rate2_pitch = 0
mixing_rate2_roll = 0
mixing_rate2_heave = 0

mixing_input3_enable = 0
mixing_rate3_all = 0
mixing_rate3_yaw = 0
mixing_rate3_pitch = 0
mixing_rate3_roll = 0
mixing_rate3_heave = 0

mixing_bias_yaw = 0
mixing_bias_pitch = 0
mixing_bias_roll = 0
mixing_bias_heave = 512
UDP_PROTOCOL_COMMAND:
4, int # $1, play time, maybe tick count
4, float # $2, 
4, float # $3, 
4, float # $4, 
4, float # $5, yaw
4, float # $6, pitch
4, float # $7, roll
4, float # $8, heave
4, float # $9, front power heave
4, float # $10, rear power heave
4, float # $11, minus speed
4, float # $12, speed
4, float # $13, heave
4, uint # $14, 
4, uint # $15, 
4, int # $16,  height
4, float # $17,

name3 = Z
